system.descriptor: Taming, Training, and riding of animals for any purpose the user wishes. Not useful for Cybernetic, Psy-Bonded, or Sapient Animals.
system.uses:
Extended Skill Test: Taming and Training an Animal to break them to the user's will, or at least form a mutual partnership. Issuing Commands to such an animal is a Half Action.
Skill Test: Full Action, make test against Hostile or Wild animal to change their disposition by one level per 2 DoS, up to 3 levels. Possible penalties for well-trained or strong-willed/intelligent animals.
